name: Zen&NowMeditation
0:
”Alexa, open Zen Meditation”
”Alexa, ask Zen Meditation for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Zen Meditation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zen meditation
des: Listen to the latest meditations from Zen&Now You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just sit down, close your eyes and listen to meditations ranging from 10 minutes to 15 minutes.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
